username.title: ユーザーネーム
username.help: Your username is used to identify you on the site and is unique to you.

email.title: Email
email.help: Your email is used to identify you on the site and is unique to you. It must be a valid email address.

usernameColour.title: Username Colour
usernameColour.help: Have a unique username colour on the site. This is visible to everyone.

profilePicture.title: Profile Picture
profilePicture.help: Your profile picture is visible to everyone. All images are ran through multiple AI moderation filters to prevent misuse.

set.title: Set Pronouns
set.help: Enter the pronouns you want to set, your current pronouns are {subject}/{object}/{possessive}
set.disclaimer: We only provide a list of set pronouns, to prevent abuse.

poweredBy.title: Powered by
poweredBy.desc: Our pronouns list is powered by pronouns.page, who were kind enough to give us permission to use their API. Please check them out at {link}!

discord.title: Discord
discord.help: Your Discord account is used to authenticate you on the site.

google.title: Google
google.help: Your Google account is used to authenticate you on the site.

github.title: GitHub
github.help: Your GitHub account is used to authenticate you on the site.

twitter.title: Twitter/X
twitter.help: Your Twitter/X account is used to authenticate you on the site.

viewSuggestiveContent.title: View Suggestive Content
viewSuggestiveContent.help: This setting allows you to view suggestive/triggering content, this is stored locally on your device.

password.title: Password
password.help: Your password is used to authenticate you on the site.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.help: Deleting your account will delete everything, including assets. You will be immediately disabled & you will be redirected to the home page. After 14 days, your account will be permanently deleted. Regain access at any time by emailing us at {email}.
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete.success: Successfully disabled account, redirecting to home page...
delete.error: Error deleting account. Contact us at {email} for help.

general.title: Report
general.help: If you find any bugs or issues with the site, please report them here.

user.title: Report User
user.help: If you find any users breaking the rules, please report them here.

asset.title: Report Asset
asset.help: If you find any assets breaking the rules, please report them here.

collection.title: Report Collection
collection.help: If you find any collections breaking the rules, please report them here.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.help: If you have any feedback or suggestions for the site, please let us know here.

errors.404: ページがありませんだ．
errors.refresh: ページを更新しようにか､ホームに戻ってください．
errors.api: Error connecting to the API. Please try again later

directionComment: Translators: Do NOT translate this string or the direction string. It's just to make sure the text direction is correct! :)
